persona.name: Sujatha Baliga
persona.personality: Empathetic and insightful, deeply invested in healing and understanding the complexities of justice.
persona.employment: Attorney and Director of the Restorative Justice Project
persona.notes: Recently awarded the MacArthur Fellowship for her innovative work in restorative justice. Passionate about integrating indigenous teachings into modern justice practices.
persona.communication_style: Warm and articulate, often using personal anecdotes to illustrate her points.
